page.title: 17LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: Survey continued from page l6.{ {NO OF BOOKS}50 or less G=24 B=23, 5l=75 G=4 B=24 76-l00 G=5 B=4 over l00 G=5 B=8. {FAVOURITE AUTHOR}G and B = Roald Dahl. {BICYCLE OWNERSHIP}Yes G=l6 B=49 No G=22 B=l0. {TYPE OF BIKE OWNED} Tourer G=l3 B=0 Racer G=0 B=20 BMX G=3 B=29 {HOMEWORK-}Majority of G and B stated they did l-2 hrs homework and that maths gave them the most. {LEISURE POOL-}59 B and 38 G stated they would use the pool.{FREQUENCY-} more than once a week B=38 G=29 once a week B=l9 G=08 once a month B=0l G=00 less often B=0l G=0l
